title: "Sci-Fi Metropolis"
content:
# Sci-Fi Metropolis

Welcome to Sci-Fi Metropolis, your ultimate destination for futuristic cityscapes and advanced technology! Our website features a stunning digital illustration of a city on a distant planet, complete with towering skyscrapers and state-of-the-art infrastructure.

At Sci-Fi Metropolis, we're passionate about exploring the possibilities of what our future cities could look like. From flying cars and holographic displays to eco-friendly energy sources and smart buildings, we showcase the latest advancements in urban design and technology.

Whether you're a science fiction enthusiast, an architect, or simply someone who appreciates beautiful art, Sci-Fi Metropolis is the perfect place to immerse yourself in a world of endless possibilities. So come and explore our digital metropolis today!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A digital illustration of a city on a distant planet, with towering buildings and advanced technology."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
